mapper.select: SELECT MM1.CNTR_NO , MM1.CNTR_SN , MM1.GIRO_BIZ_DV_CD , MM1.GIRO_BIZ_TP_CD , MM1.CST_FNM , MM1.GIRO_PLRCV_ADR_ID , MM1.GIRO_PLRCV_RGST_DT , MM1.FST_RGST_USR_ID , MM2.RNADR AS BAS_ADR /*주소*/ , MM2.RDADR AS DTL_ADR /*상세주소*/ , MM2.NEW_ADR_ZIP AS ZIP /*우편번호*/ FROM ( SELECT M1.CNTR_NO , NVL(M2.CNTR_SN , #{cntrSn}) AS CNTR_SN , NVL(M2.GIRO_BIZ_DV_CD , '2' ) AS GIRO_BIZ_DV_CD --지로업무구분코드 , NVL(M2.GIRO_BIZ_TP_CD , '2' ) AS GIRO_BIZ_TP_CD --지로업무유형코드 판매유형 , NVL(M2.CST_FNM , M1.RCGVP_KNM) AS CST_FNM --고객명 , NVL(M2.GIRO_PLRCV_ADR_ID , M1.ADR_ID ) AS GIRO_PLRCV_ADR_ID --주소ID , NVL(M2.GIRO_PLRCV_RGST_DT , M1.FST_RGST_DTM) AS GIRO_PLRCV_RGST_DT --등록일자 , NVL(M2.FST_RGST_USR_ID , M1.FST_RGST_USR_ID) AS FST_RGST_USR_ID --업무담당 FROM ( SELECT S1.CNTR_NO , S1.ADR_ID , S1.FST_RGST_DTM , S1.RCGVP_KNM , S1.FST_RGST_USR_ID FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS S1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND (S1.CNTRT_REL_CD IN ('02','00') OR S1.CNTRT_REL_CD IS NULL ) AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY S1.ADR_ID DESC ) M1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_GIRO_PLRCV_BAS M2 ON M2.CNTR_NO = M1.CNTR_NO AND M2.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} AND M2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1 ) MM1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS MM2 ON MM2.ADR_ID = MM1.GIRO_PLRCV_ADR_ID AND MM2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N'
